title: Washi Washi Battle
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Lately everyone has been on edge when they’re near me right? Why!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Me too. Everyone is extra careful of getting my washi washi<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>You’re the same too huh, Nozomi<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>But, I don’t really mind it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Eh!? Really!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Because, even if they are, the washi washi won’t stop….! With that said, Mari-chan….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Prepare yourself~! Washi washi washi~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I won’t lose either! Washi washi washi~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ahahaha<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Ahahaha<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
